context_bundle.summary: 5 Integration Models: Hub-Spoke (central platform, N integrations not N*N), Event-Driven (real-time triggers, no polling), Data Pipeline (ETL: extract-validate-transform-enrich-load-analyze), Orchestration (conductor coordinates multi-step with approvals), Microservices (reusable services combined flexibly)

onboarding.quick_start: Hub-Spoke: SharePoint/Dataverse as hub, systems connect to hub only. Event-Driven: Trigger on action, not schedule. Pipeline: For reporting/analytics. Orchestration: Long-running approval workflows. Microservices: Build once, use everywhere.
common_patterns: Event types: Data (CRUD), User (form submit), System (file upload), Time (deadline)
Pipeline stages: Extract -> Validate -> Transform -> Enrich -> Load -> Analyze
Microservice categories: Data, Communication, Integration, Business Logic, Utility
known_errors: Polling when events available = wasted resources
